channel.title: solar storm
channel.description: A world where everyone holds the power to employ science and creativity for good.

item.title: A MASSIVE THANK YOU from the SMASHfestUK Team
item.dc:creator: Lindsay
item.description: A massive THANK YOU to everyone who took part in Smashfestuk this week, and to everyone who came and visited us! We hope you all had a fun time, learnt lots about ‪#‎science‬ ‪#‎stem‬, stretched your creativity and curiousity and found out how to survive a ‪#‎Solarstorm‬. A massive THANK Read more…
item.content:encoded:
A massive THANK YOU to everyone who took part in Smashfestuk this week, and to everyone who came and visited us! We hope you all had a fun time, learnt lots about ‪#‎science‬ ‪#‎stem‬, stretched your creativity and curiousity and found out how to survive a ‪#‎Solarstorm‬.

A massive THANK YOU to our partners and sponsors! We couldn’t do it without your belief and support. Thank you to:

Middlesex University 

The Wellcome Trust

The Arts Council

The Royal Society of Chemistry

Science and Technology Facilities Council

University of Greenwich

Greenwich and Lewisham Young People’s Theatre

Royal Observatory Greenwich

Vound Software

L&Q Housing

Lewisham Borough Council

SMASHfestUK is a ‘not-for-profit‘ festival, and we are very grateful to all our partners for their support, but in order to make the festival bigger and better (and remain free!) we are grateful for any help you can offer. You can make a donation here: ./../../../support/index.html Or learn how to get involved here: ./../../../get-involved/index.html
The hope is to expand the festival, so who knows, SMASHfestUK may pop up in your local area as well as Deptford! Keep an eye out on our website and our Facebook/Twitter pages for future news, and thank you once again for your support!
The SMASHfestUK Team
